product_name: Mountain House Rice and Chicken - Single Serving
long_description: Satisfy your hunger in an instant with the Mountain House hot meal of rice, chicken, and pimentos in a white sauce. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve; resealable foil pouch helps retain warmth. New compact vacuum pouch leaves more room in your pack and won't expand at high elevations. Quick and easy entree for camping and backpacking; single serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Satisfy your hunger in an instant with the Mountain House hot meal of rice, chicken, and pimentos in a white sauce.
